articles.author: Emma Colton
articles.title: Mexico's president tries turning tables on Trump with 'nice' naming idea of her own - Fox News
articles.description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum responded to President-elect Trump's plans to rename the Gulf of Mexico by joking about renaming the U.S. "Mexican America."
articles.content:
Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum chided President-elect Trump for saying he plans to rename the Gulf of Mexico, saying she has a new name for the United States. 
"Mexican America. That sounds nic… [+2469 chars]

articles.title: Jimmy Carter's life intersected with slavery's legacy. His record on Civil Rights is complicated - The Associated Press

articles.title: Is bird flu the next pandemic? What to know after the first H5N1 death in the US - CNN
